title: [PSP]Metal_Gear_Acid
description: One of the more bizarre games to launch with the PSP, Metal Gear Acid pits Solid Snake against a base full of soldiers with only one weapon: a...deck of cards? That\\\&#039;s right; in this card-game, turn-based strategy game, you\\\&#039;ll need to construct a deck drawn from over 200 cards based on events and characters in previous Metal Gear games, and use it to defeat numerous soldiers, robots, security cameras, and a few bosses. GameSpot\\\&#039;s Game Guide to Acid gives you a full walkthrough and plenty of deck construction tips to help you out!
